pages.text: The Insightful Condenser is a device that can collect experience from nearby blocks which have stored it internally using a $(l:thermal:technology/augments/xp_storage)Knowledge Concentrator$(/l). It then converts that experience to liquid form. At base, it collects in a 5x5x5 area centered on it, which can be increased using $(l:thermal:technology/augments/area_radius)Radial Enhancement augments$(/l).

pages.title: Insightful Condenser
pages.text: When controlled via redstone signal, the Insightful Condenser will immediately collect the moment it is turned on. This way, it will always reliably activate when pulsed.
